meta.content: Bridges PCS is a public charter school in Washington, DC, serving students in preschool through 5th grade.

div.p: To reach us during the school closure, please emailinfo@bridgespcs.orgor call (202) 695-2393.This number and email address can be used to communicate any questions or concerns that you have to the schools staff.

div.p: During this unprecedented public health emergency, our city is committed to ensuring the well-being of our students and school communities.Therefore, starting Monday, March 16 through Tuesday, March 31, following the request of Mayor Muriel Bowser, Bridges PCS will be modify operations to help mitigate the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19) in our region.
Bridges PCS will follow an updated schedule between March 16 and March 31:
Monday, March 16 Teachers and staff will report to school to plan for distance learning. No school for students.
Tuesday, March 17 to Monday, March 23 Bridges PCS will take its Spring Break for students and teachers. There will no longer be a Spring Break period in April.
Tuesday, March 24 to Tuesday, March 31 Students will participate in distance learning.
Wednesday, April 1 Schools will resume operations.

Durante esta emergencia de salud pblica sin precedentes, nuestra ciudad contina comprometida a asegurar el bienestar de nuestros estudiantes y comunidades escolares.Por lo tanto, desde el lunes 16 de marzo hasta el martes 31 de marzo, siguiendo las recomendaciones de la AlcaldesaMuriel Bowser,Bridges PCSmodificar operaciones para ayudar amitigar la propagacin del coronavirus (COVID-19) en nuestra regin.
Bridges PCSseguir un horario actualizado y modificado entre el 16 de marzo y 31 de marzo:

li.p: Lunes, 16 de marzo los maestros y el personal se reportarn a la escuela para planificar el aprendizaje a distancia. No habr clases para los estudiantes.
Martes, 17 de marzo al lunes, 23 de marzoBridges PCS tomar sus vacaciones de primavera para los estudiantes y maestros. Ya no habr un perodo de vacaciones de primavera en abril.
Martes, 24 de marzo al martes, 31 de marzo los estudiantes participarn en el aprendizaje a distancia.
Mircoles, 1 de abril reinicio de operaciones en la escuela.

div.h2: BY BRIDGES PCS THIRD GRADE CLASS OF 2018-2019
div.p: With the help of staff and volunteers from 826DC, in 2019 our 3rd graders wrote this beautiful anthology of fairytales about nature personified. Click here to order your copy and support 826DC and their network of future authors.

Bridges Public Charter School from Bridges Public Charter School on Vimeo.

","resolvedBy":"manual","hSize":null,"floatDir":null}

div.p: Bridges Public Charter School from Bridges Public Charter School on Vimeo.

p.em: An inclusive learning community builds bridges of understanding, awareness, and support by connecting children and families with a variety of different needs, cultures, and backgrounds.

div.p: Our mission is to provide an exemplary educational program that includes all students. Our developmentally appropriate, student and family-centered educational approach nurtures students to expand their developmental skills, in order to build a foundation for life-long learning.

figure.blockquote:

This truly diverse school is a gem, one of a kind, a really special place with an open and nurturing living environment where everyone thrives.
